intro: Welcome to a whimsical animal adventure in which your choices shape the story and the world reacts to your actions!
description:
A Short & Whisker-Twitching Adventure!
Step into the paws of a curious cat in this choice-driven, storybook-style game!
Explore, interact, and make decisions that shape your journey, whether that means making friends, causing mischief, or discovering something unexpected.

What’s in the Box?
- Be a Cat - Nap, explore, knock things over, and do what cats do best!
- Make Choices - Your decisions shape the story, leading to different outcomes.
- Meet Quirky Characters - Befriend (or bother) a cast of charming animal NPCs.

It’s a short and delightful game, perfect for a cozy playthrough in a single sitting. Where will your paws take you?
